PackageOracle.name: DA_MEMO
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MEMO
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.04.266677000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_id IN NUMBER
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_memo;

body.name: DA_MEMO
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MEMO
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.04.291992000 AM -05:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo.add(fx), parms=' || memo_type_cd || '|' || memo_persist || '|' || memo_seq_no || '|' || memo_txt || '|' || entered_by || '|' || entered_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_memo a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.memo_id
,a.memo_type_cd
,a.memo_persist
,a.memo_seq_no
,a.memo_txt
,a.entered_by
,a.entered_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_memo_id.NEXTVAL
,add.memo_type_cd
,add.memo_persist
,add.memo_seq_no
,add.memo_txt
,add.entered_by
,add.entered_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
) RETURNING a.memo_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo.add, parms=' || memo_type_cd || '|' || memo_persist || '|' || memo_seq_no || '|' || memo_txt || '|' || entered_by || '|' || entered_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_memo a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.memo_id
,a.memo_type_cd
,a.memo_persist
,a.memo_seq_no
,a.memo_txt
,a.entered_by
,a.entered_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_memo_id.NEXTVAL
,add.memo_type_cd
,add.memo_persist
,add.memo_seq_no
,add.memo_txt
,add.entered_by
,add.entered_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_id IN NUMBER
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_persist IN VARCHAR2
,memo_seq_no IN NUMBER
,memo_txt IN VARCHAR2
,entered_by IN VARCHAR2
,entered_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo.add, parms=' || memo_id || '|' || memo_type_cd || '|' || memo_persist || '|' || memo_seq_no || '|' || memo_txt || '|' || entered_by || '|' || entered_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_memo a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.memo_id
,a.memo_type_cd
,a.memo_persist
,a.memo_seq_no
,a.memo_txt
,a.entered_by
,a.entered_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,add.memo_id
,add.memo_type_cd
,add.memo_persist
,add.memo_seq_no
,add.memo_txt
,add.entered_by
,add.entered_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo.del, parms=' || memo_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_memo a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.memo_id = del.memo_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo.del');

END del;

END da_memo;
